name: Stios
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect with Riveric loanwords
annual tide-festival with small boat burials
diet heavy on salted fish and seaweed
constraints: No instant resurrection; long-range mind influence rare and institutionally banned
Ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
Navigational auguries cannot replace charts and seamanship
notes: Tech baseline: near-medieval to early-industrial; localized ritual magic common
